name: Billionaire Trivia
description:
BILLIONAIRE TRIVIA!

How to play… Billionaire trivia is 7 years + game where players answer trivia questions. First you all place your player tokens on the start square everyone starts with three dollar sign  tokens/30 dollars, for this game you will not need a dice and the trivia cards are separated into kid cards and adult cards, preferably so the answers are achievable to answer. If you don’t understand what I mean by you don’t need a dice, I mean every time it is your turn you just move up a square. You can work on teams if there are more than 4 players. Also, you can mix up the teams kids with adults and adults with kids. You may notice that there are tokens, these tokens have dollar signs on them, that means every time you answer get an right you get a token if you get it wrong you stay where you are. The dollar sign tokens are worth $10 and the rare pink star tokens are worth $100. The only way to get a pink token is to get an action lottery card and other action cards. Once everyone reaches the finish square you all add up your tokens and whoever has the most money wins, the first person to win gets 5 extra tokens. The person answering the question has 15 seconds to answer.

Items:

  • 30 action cards
  • 30 kid question cards
  • 30 adult question cards
  • 1 game board
  • 32 $ tokens
  • 10 star tokens
  • 10 heart pieces
